mapper.select: select a.id,c.company_name,a.start_date, b.is_contact from (SELECT * from order_info where start_date >= #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE} ) a LEFT JOIN order_detail b on a.id = b.order_id LEFT JOIN company c on a.company_id = c.id WHERE b.cameraman_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY a.start_date

select a.id,c.company_name,a.start_date, b.is_contact from (SELECT * from order_info where start_date >= #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE} and start_date < #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}) a LEFT JOIN order_detail b on a.id = b.order_id LEFT JOIN company c on a.company_id = c.id WHERE b.cameraman_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY a.start_date
select count(*) c from order_info where start_date > #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE};
